name: splatter
content:

(especially of a thick liquid) to hit and cover a surface with small drops, or to cause this to happen: The bike was splattered with mud.

drops of a thick liquid that have splashed or fallen somewhere: There was a splatter of paint on the floor. His car was covered in mud splatters.
More examplesFewer examplesIf you leave your kitchen appliances out they are likely to get dirty from splatters and grease in the air.Forensic scientists analysed blood splatters on the wall.The painting is a white canvas with black splatters.
